name: pipeline-naming-task
description: Set the name of the pipeline using [Azure DevOps predefined variables](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/build/variables) and (extra) runtime variables
helpMarkDown:
Set the name of the pipline using:
- [Azure DevOps predefined variables](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/build/variables)
- runtime variables:
    - `%IterationName%` The name of the iteration that was active on the date of the commit
author: Floris Devreese

inputs.name: format
inputs.label: Format
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Set the name of the pipline using:
- [Azure DevOps predefined variables](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/build/variables)
- runtime variables:
    - `%IterationName%` The name of the iteration that was active on the date of the commit

Example: `1.%IterationName%.$(Build.BuildId)`
